name: Shrinking Panes
description:
This is my entry for Ludum Dare 42.

This was my first time using Unity for a 3D game, and everything was created by me in 48 hours.  The game is nothing like what I set out to make at all, but I'm very happy with the end result.

The web version is a little buggy.  If you have problems, please download the standalone version.  The mouse capture works best in full screen mode.
